scanLog.description:
'freetype (2.8.1-2ubuntu2.1) bionic-security; urgency=medium

  * SECURITY UPDATE: heap buffer overflow via integer truncation in
    Load_SBit_Png
    - debian/patches-freetype/CVE-2020-15999.patch: Update
      src/sfnt/pngshim.c to test and reject invalid bitmap size earlier in
      Load_SBit_Png. Based on upstream patch.
    - CVE-2020-15999

 -- Alex Murray <alex.murray@canonical.com>  Tue, 20 Oct 2020 12:49:06 +1030'

'php-imagick (3.4.3~rc2-2ubuntu4.1) bionic-security; urgency=medium

  * SECURITY UPDATE: Out of bounds write
    - debian/patches/0001-Bounds-check-kernel-origin-position.patch: Bounds
      check kernel origin position.
    - debian/patches/0002-avoid-unsigned-less-than-equal-warning.patch: avoid
      unsigned less than equal warning.
    - debian/patches/0003-Typo.patch: Typo.
    - debian/patches/0004-Change-to-unsigned-long-to-avoid-C-complaining.patch:
      Change to unsigned long to avoid C complaining.
    - debian/patches/0005-Correcting-signed-unsigned-checking.patch: Correcting
      signed/unsigned checking.
    - debian/patches/0006-And-so-the-long-day-wore-on.patch: And so the long
      day wore on.
    - debian/patches/0008-Corrected-typo-for-columns-rows.patch: Corrected typo
      for columns => rows.
    - CVE-2019-11037

 -- Paulo Flabiano Smorigo <pfsmorigo@canonical.com>  Wed, 07 Oct 2020 18:37:07 +0000'

'freetype (2.10.1-2ubuntu0.1) focal-security; urgency=medium

'brotli (1.0.7-6ubuntu0.1) focal-security; urgency=medium

  * SECURITY UPDATE: Buffr overflow
    - debian/patches/CVE-2020-8927.patch: fix potential overflow when
      input chunk is >2GiB in c/common/*, c/dec/*, c/enc/*,
      research/brotli_decoder.c, research/draw_histogram.cc,
      scripts/.bintray.json, scripts/source.lst, setup.py.
    - CVE-2020-8927

 -- Leonidas S. Barbosa <leo.barbosa@canonical.com>  Mon, 28 Sep 2020 14:25:38 -0300'

'linux (4.15.0-122.124) bionic; urgency=medium

  * bionic/linux: 4.15.0-122.124 -proposed tracker (LP: #1899941)

  * CVE-2020-12351 // CVE-2020-12352 // CVE-2020-24490
    - Bluetooth: Disable High Speed by default
    - Bluetooth: MGMT: Fix not checking if BT_HS is enabled
    - [Config] Disable BlueZ highspeed support

  * CVE-2020-12351
    - Bluetooth: L2CAP: Fix calling sk_filter on non-socket based channel

  * CVE-2020-12352
    - Bluetooth: A2MP: Fix not initializing all members

 -- Kleber Sacilotto de Souza <kleber.souza@canonical.com>  Thu, 15 Oct 2020 14:39:56 +0200'

'freetype (2.8.1-2ubuntu2.1) bionic-security; urgency=medium

    - debian/patches-freetype/CVE-2020-15999.patch: Update

    - CVE-2020-15999

 -- Alex Murray <alex.murray@canonical.com>  Tue, 20 Oct 2020 12:49:06 +1030'

'vim (2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.4) bionic-security; urgency=medium

  * SECURITY UPDATE: rvim restricted mode circumvention
    - debian/patches/CVE-2019-20807-1.patch: disable using interfaces in
      restricted mode in runtime/doc/starting.txt, src/evalfunc.c,
      src/ex_cmds.c, src/ex_docmd.c, src/if_perl.xs,
      src/testdir/Make_all.mak, src/testdir/test_restricted.vim.
    - debian/patches/CVE-2019-20807-2.patch: missing some changes for Ex
      commands in src/ex_cmds.h.
    - CVE-2019-20807

 -- Marc Deslauriers <marc.deslauriers@ubuntu.com>  Tue, 13 Oct 2020 11:49:09 -0400'

'vim (2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.4) bionic-security; urgency=medium

'python3.6 (3.6.9-1~18.04ubuntu1.3) bionic-security; urgency=medium

  * SECURITY UPDATE: CRLF injection
    - debian/patches/CVE-2020-26116.patch: prevent header injection
      in http methods in Lib/httplib.py, Lib/test/test_httlib.py.
    - CVE-2020-26116
  * debian/patches/disabling_test_ttk_guionly.patch: disabling ttk_guionly
    test which is causing a hang for ppc64el build.

 -- Leonidas S. Barbosa <leo.barbosa@canonical.com>  Thu, 08 Oct 2020 09:12:24 -0300'

'python3.6 (3.6.9-1~18.04ubuntu1.3) bionic-security; urgency=medium

  * SECURITY UPDATE: CRLF injection
    - debian/patches/CVE-2020-26116.patch: prevent header injection
      in http methods in Lib/httplib.py, Lib/test/test_httlib.py.
    - CVE-2020-26116
  * debian/patches/disabling_test_ttk_guionly.patch: disabling ttk_guionly
    test which is causing a hang for ppc64el build.

 -- Leonidas S. Barbosa <leo.barbosa@canonical.com>  Thu, 08 Oct 2020 09:12:24 -0300'

  * debian/patches/disabling_test_ttk_guionly.patch: disabling ttk_guionly

 -- Leonidas S. Barbosa <leo.barbosa@canonical.com>  Thu, 08 Oct 2020 09:12:24 -0300'

'linux (4.15.0-122.124) bionic; urgency=medium

  * bionic/linux: 4.15.0-122.124 -proposed tracker (LP: #1899941)

  * CVE-2020-12351 // CVE-2020-12352 // CVE-2020-24490
    - Bluetooth: Disable High Speed by default
    - Bluetooth: MGMT: Fix not checking if BT_HS is enabled
    - [Config] Disable BlueZ highspeed support

  * CVE-2020-12351
    - Bluetooth: L2CAP: Fix calling sk_filter on non-socket based channel

  * CVE-2020-12352
    - Bluetooth: A2MP: Fix not initializing all members

 -- Kleber Sacilotto de Souza <kleber.souza@canonical.com>  Thu, 15 Oct 2020 14:39:56 +0200'
